prompt:
Nurse: Thank you for confirming your date of birth, Mr. Dang. I'm calling about your upcoming colonoscopy on August 17 at 10:00 AM. Is this a good time to talk?

Patient: Hi. Of course, it is.

Nurse: Hello, Mr. Great, thank you, Mr. Dang. I hope your day is going well so far. How are you feeling about your upcoming colonoscopy procedure?

Patient: Why my tummy is hurting

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing abdominal pain, Mr. Dang. Can you tell me a bit more about it?

Patient: So I wanna do this as soon as I can.

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing abdominal pain, Mr. Dang. Can you confirm that this is the reason you're having the colonoscopy?

Patient: Oh, that's the only reason I'm having it

responses.gpt4: I understand that. Could you please clarify the type of abdominal pain you are experiencing? Is it a sharp, stabbing pain or more of a dull, constant ache? Also, can you let me know the exact area where you're feeling the pain?
responses.our_model: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you.
